What We Offer

Pre-Book Tickets

Pre-book your tickets to avoid queuing or disappointment if they are sold out.

Book Now

Brochures

Purchase Brochures at the ticket office. They contain a full list of activities that you can take part in at JEM ZOO.

Maps

Purchase maps at the ticket office, detailing all the areas of the zoo including where you can eat or where you can find the aquarium.

Member Tickets

Members at JEM ZOO can get special discounts on tickets for events, enquire at the ticket office.

Lets Get Started

Check Out Our Animals

Which ones are you hoping to see during your visit?

Make a list and tick them off as you go along.

Our Animals

Visit Our Beautiful Gardens

Take in the fresh air and relax your mind, let the atmosphere sooth you.

Just For Schools

PLANNING A SCHOOL TRIP?
We’re an FABULOUS location for school trip! We have a whole list of free learning resources to help the kids get all the information and educational content they need.

Food At JEM ZOO

PLANNING A SCHOOL TRIP?
We have 10 restaurants and snack bars around the zoo serving the best cuisine to all our visitors. All dishes are prepared to a high standard and under top health and safety standards.

Lets Explore

Let your imagination run wild. Join us for an early morning tour to see the zoo come to life before we open to the public, as our keepers prepare for the day ahead. See some of our animals having breakfast.

Hungry? Eat At JEM ZOO!

Try the tasty food we have on offer. There is a large selection of delicacies for the whole family, take your pick.
